segments.text: I walk into this kitchen and see the woman carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on that dish, not looking around at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh no, the sink is overflowing right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just gushing out and spilling onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has one foot in the puddle and doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, there's a boy climbing on a wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting back, that looks dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing there, holding out her hand for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking treats while she's oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside the window looks so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn't tip and someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is about to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
